name: PagerDuty
description: This app integrates with PagerDuty to implement investigative and ticketing actions

Get list of teams configured on PagerDuty
Get the current on call personnel (DEPRECATED)
actions.verbose: DEPRECATED: Please use get oncall user instead.

team.description: Team to get on call of

actions.description: Get list of oncalls on PagerDuty
Get list of available services on PagerDuty

example_values: This service was created during onboarding on April 7, 2016.

actions.description: Get list of users on PagerDuty
actions.verbose: To get a list of users in a certain team (or teams) add a comma-separated list of team IDs to the team_ids parameter.

actions.description: Get list of escalation policies on PagerDuty
actions.verbose:
Results can be filtered based in user IDs and team IDs

To filter on user IDs, add a comma-separated list to the user_ids parameter. The results will include only escalation policies that apply to all users in the list.

To filter on team IDs, add a comma-separated list to the team_ids parameter. The results will include all escalation policies that apply to any team in the list.

example_values: This service was created during onboarding on April 7, 2016.

actions.verbose:
The email parameter may be required to create an incident depending on the configuration of the PagerDuty instance.

Either the escalation_id or the assignee_id parameter can be used to provide notification and assignment settings to the incident. If neither is provided, the default escalation policy on the PagerDuty system will be used.

If both are provided, the escalation_id will be used.

escalation_id.description: ID of escalation policy to use

assignee_id.description: ID of user to assign incident to

actions.description: Get list of users for a specific escalation policy
actions.verbose: Finds the list of users associated with the escalation_id.

escalation_id.description: ID of escalation policy to use

actions.description: Get information on a particular user
actions.verbose: Finds name, email, and all other information on a given user_id.
